world_traits.name: Haze
world_traits.description: During battle, visibility is reduced to 1D6+8"

world_traits.name: Overgrown
world_traits.description: When setting up the table, you must add 1D6+2 individual plant features or 1D3 areas of vegetation (roughly 3-5" across)

world_traits.name: Warzone
world_traits.description: When setting up the table, you must add 1D3 ruined buildings or craters to the table.

world_traits.name: Heavily enforced
world_traits.description: When fighting opponents from the Criminal Elements Encounter Table, the number encountered is reduced by 1. When rolling to see if they become Rivals, only roll a single die as normal.

world_traits.name: Rampant crime
world_traits.description: When fighting opponents from the Criminal Elements encounter list, add 1 to the number encountered.

world_traits.name: Imminent invasion
world_traits.description: Add +2 to all Invasion rolls and if the world is invaded, rolls for war progress are at -1.

world_traits.name: Lacks starship facilities
world_traits.description: You cannot spend more than 3 credits per campaign turn on starship Repairs.

world_traits.name: Easy recruiting
world_traits.description: Add +1 to the roll when Recruiting.

world_traits.name: Medical science
world_traits.description: The cost for accelerated medical care is only 3 credits per character.
